0.text: The European Union is causing chaos in Europe

3.text:
as it stumbles from one self-created crisis
to another, with no democratic mandate for

8.text:
any of it. Not content with removing elected
governments and overturning democratic ballots

14.text:
whose results they disapprove of, the European
Union has now opened Europe's borders to

19.text:
the most backward and violent culture on this
planet, and one that rejects any concept of

25.text:
basic human rights. What could possibly go
wrong? These migrants stopped being refugees

32.text:
the moment they refused to register for asylum
in the first safe country they arrived in,

37.text:
as per the law. But the European Union has
refused to enforce the law, removing any incentive

44.text:
for countries to police the external border
effectively when they know they can simply

48.text:
move people on, thereby encouraging millions
more to come. And millions more are now on

54.text:
the way. An unbiased observer watching from
space might think that the people of Europe

60.text:
had taken leave of their senses, but we haven't.
We've taken leave of our democracy. And

65.text:
now we're taking leave of our security.
The European Union could have stopped this

71.text:
crisis from day one by following Australia's
proven success in turning back the boats and

77.text:
processing genuine refugees offshore, but
that was too much like common sense. Instead,

83.text:
they behaved with their usual arrogance and
made the situation much worse by breaking

87.text:
the law (I can't emphasise this too much)
and effectively inviting the entire Muslim

92.text:
world to Europe. This is guaranteed to make
Europe more dangerous for everyone, but especially

98.text:
for women, and for gay people, and for Jews.
It's also putting money into the pockets

104.text:
of criminals, and is effectively bankrolling
the human trafficking industry. Angela Merkel

111.text:
wants Germany to pay for the Second World
War by committing suicide. Her insane invitation

117.text:
to the Muslim third world means that the number
of rapes in Germany is now set to skyrocket.

121.text:
In fact, it has already started. And she can
take personal credit for that. All you "progressive"

128.text:
Pollyannas with your dopey little "refugees
welcome" signs can take a bow too, because

132.text:
despite what the media would like us to believe,
most of these migrants are unaccompanied men,

139.text:
and Europe's prisons are already full of
third world Muslim men who don't know how

144.text:
to behave in a civilised society. The last
thing we need is to import even more of them,

149.text:
because wherever third world Muslim men go,
so does rape. It's a cultural thing. But

155.text:
that's exactly what the European Union
is doing, breaking the law to import a violent

161.text:
misogynistic rape culture into Europe that
directly threatens the safety of women and

166.text:
violates their human rights. And the German
media are colluding with this. If you're

172.text:
a third world Muslim migrant in Germany who
enjoys a bit of casual rape (and I know many

178.text:
of you do) you can carry on raping safe in
the knowledge that the media will keep it

182.text:
nice and quiet. They're on your side. So
far, they (and the police) have kept very

188.text:
quiet about the epidemic of rape, child abuse,
and forced prostitution in the refugee centres,

194.text:
where things are so bad that women and girls
have to sleep in their street clothes. Women's

199.text:
organisations even wrote a public letter to
the government demanding separate women-only

204.text:
premises to keep predatory men away. The police
won't talk about all the rapes because

210.text:
they don't want to legitimise critics of
mass migration. How noble of them. They don't

216.text:
want to legitimise critics of breaking the
law. Yet they still feel the need to warn

222.text:
local people not to let their children outside
unaccompanied and not to let teenage girls

227.text:
wear revealing clothes, and they warn women
not to walk to and from the train station

232.text:
alone because it's close to a refugee centre.
They know what everyone in Europe now knows,

238.text:
that third world Muslim men are raised from
the cradle to despise and fear women and to

243.text:
treat them as inferior. And when they come
to a civilised place like Europe they treat

249.text:
European women the same way because they're
too pig ignorant to know any different. And

255.text:
we put up with it because we're so "progressive"
and tolerant and compassionate and all. And

260.text:
we don't like to talk about it because
it might be racist. And we try to understand

264.text:
and make allowances for them and their poxy
excuse for a culture. And we skulk like cowards

271.text:
behind empty words like inclusion and difference,
and applaud ourselves like seals for our bullshit

278.text:
humanitarianism, while Europe gets more and
more dangerous for women. And for gay people,

284.text:
and for Jews. In fact, now for everyone, because
given that the free movement of people also

290.text:
means the free movement of jihad, you'd
have to be an idiot (or a politician) not

296.text:
to see what's coming. The Islamic State
claims to have thousands of fighters already

302.text:
in Europe, and more are coming in every day
because the European Union's criminal negligence

307.text:
means that Europe has no external borders.
Serious bloodshed is on the way for which

313.text:
the European Union is one hundred percent
responsible, but the politicians with personal

319.text:
bodyguards needn't worry, as they're
not the ones likely to be murdered. The only

326.text:
reason that any of this is happening is because
the European Union is breaking the law. If

332.text:
they can break the law, why can't we all?
Why can't we all just do what we like and

337.text:
take what we like? Why should anyone respect
the law when it clearly means nothing? If

343.text:
we don't stop the boats this illegal invasion
will never end, and it's clear that the

349.text:
European Union has no desire to stop the boats.
They want this flood of humanity to continue

356.text:
until Europe has been forcibly and irrevocably
merged with a backward and violent culture

362.text:
that's hostile to everything we claim to
stand for. They're importing barbarism,

368.text:
they're importing war, and they're showing
beyond any shadow of doubt that they cannot

374.text:
be trusted with Europe's security. It's
time for the people of Europe to claim asylum
